iwarp.arch: VLIW/systolic array processor (Intel/CMU). Precursor to modern GPU thinking. Dual-issue: computation + communication agents.

t800.arch: 32-bit transputer with on-chip FPU. 4KB SRAM, IEEE 754 FPU. Occam/CSP concurrency model.

staran.arch: Associative/bit-serial massively parallel processor. 256 PEs, each 1-bit. NASA satellite image processing.

icl_dap.arch: 4096-element SIMD array processor. 1-bit PEs. Attached to ICL 2900 mainframe.

msm5205.arch: ADPCM speech synthesis chip. 4-bit ADPCM decoder, ~384kHz sample rate. Used in hundreds of arcade games.

sp0256.arch: Allophone speech processor. 64 allophones in internal ROM. Microsequencer-based. Used in Intellivoice.

tms5100.arch: LPC speech synthesis (Speak and Spell). 12-bit LPC coefficients, 10 reflection parameters. Internal microsequencer.

m6854.arch: ADLC (Advanced Data Link Controller). HDLC/SDLC protocol processor. State machine with frame processing.
